attributes.action: reduction of the amount of mp,s in house of commons
attributes.additional_details:
reduce the amount of mp,s by at least 50%
with a redundancy deal of 1 week or 1and a half weeks salary, depending on the age of person being made compulsory redundant same as the man in the street,just to prove that we really are all in this financial struggle, and want to make our country great once again-some hope.
